I was asking for people's experience in previous rounds  how many days after deposit will the funds be usually earmarked... Cos that's an indication that the amount is correct. For context  I chose 150k  have maintained 1k balance since May. But in June  I have ~30k in and out within the same day. So I wanted to use the earmark as an early indication if my 150k today is counted... Going by the T&Cs strictly  my 150k-30k only results in 120k fresh fund  so since I've selected 150k  if it isn't sufficient  the entire fund wouldn't be earmarked at all.
